longBusinessSummary: BPLI Holdings Inc., an e-learning based training company, designs, develops, and delivers workplace training for individuals, businesses, military personnel, and the public sector in Canada. The company operates in two segments, Training and Simulation Business, and Learning Networks Business segments. The Training and Simulation Business segment provides custom courseware development, training and simulation products, and in-service support and resource augmentation solutions to enhance the safety, productivity, and efficiency of military and civil personnel. It develops and offers learning solutions for interactive instructor-led training, computer-assisted instruction, and computer-based training; and virtual task training and three dimensional modeling products and systems for training or operations support. This segment also provides specialized aerospace simulation training products; learning content management and learning management systems; and resource augmentation solutions. The Learning Networks Business segment offers learning management solutions and content to private and public sector customers. It offers Bluedrop360, a cloud-based learning management solution for individuals, corporations, and other organizations. The company was formerly known as Bluedrop Performance Learning Inc. and changed its name to BPLI Holdings Inc. in March 2020. BPLI Holdings Inc. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in St. John's, Canada.
